member.name: T:System.TConsole
member.summary: Provides additional thread-safe methods for writing to the console using colors and other fancy formatting

member.summary: Writes text to console with a pre- and post-fix newline

member.name: M:System.TConsole.WriteBlockColored(System.ConsoleColor,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes colored text to console with a pre- and post-fix newline, resetting the foreground color to the previous value

member.name: M:System.TConsole.WriteColored(System.ConsoleColor,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes colored text to the console, resetting the foreground color to the previous value

member.name: M:System.TConsole.WriteLineColored(System.ConsoleColor,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes colored text lines to the console, resetting the foreground color to the previous value

member.name: M:System.TConsole.WriteHighlighted(System.ConsoleColor,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes highlighted text to the console, resetting the background color to the previous value

member.name: M:System.TConsole.WriteLineHighlighted(System.ConsoleColor,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes highlighted text lines to the console, resetting the background color to the previous value

member.name: M:System.TConsole.WriteColored(System.ConsoleColor,System.ConsoleColor,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes both highlighted and colored text to the console, resetting both values to the previous

member.name: M:System.TConsole.WriteLineColored(System.ConsoleColor,System.ConsoleColor,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes both highlighted and colored text lines to the console, resetting both values to the previous
